content: Chip Tatum was a personal friend of mine for a while after he came out of the CIA drug ops with people like Michael Maholy,CIA/Naval Intelligence, my personal friend, all working under false patriot Ollie North with the CIA drug ops out of Columbia, SA.Chip went underground. I heard he was killed. How sad. Michael is still alive. The undergorund got word to me personally from him after 13 years incommunicado.-Pamela Schuffert
